schema.name: login_email
schema.description: Login Email column. Type: STRING. Optional.

schema.name: identifier
schema.description: Identifier column. Type: INTEGER. Optional.

schema.name: ingestion_timestamp
schema.description: Timestamp when the record was ingested into the platform

schema.name: source_system
schema.description: Identifier of the source system providing the data

schema.name: batch_id
schema.description: Unique identifier for the ingestion batch

schema.name: record_hash
schema.description: Hash of record content used for change detection

schema.name: is_deleted
schema.description: Logical delete indicator for soft-deleted records

schema.name: deleted_timestamp
schema.description: Timestamp when the record was logically deleted

schema.name: op_type
schema.description: CDC operation type: INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE

schema.name: op_ts
schema.description: Timestamp when the CDC operation occurred (UTC)
